show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: A Psychiatrist In Transformation
content:
Kelly Brogan, MD is a NYC psychiatrist who specializes in helping women through nutrition, diet and other alternative... <!--more--> approaches.   Listen to this extraordinary young doctor’s honest coming to grips with her flawed professional training and her efforts to leave psychiatric drugs behind in her search for more helpful approaches to helping her patients.
   A very lively discussion.
